Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package teckit for versions less than 2.5.12-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package teckit for versions less than 2.5.12-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package teckit is earlier than 2.5.12-4, affected by CVE-2018-25032
